sentence.Network_en: You're going to have to forgive my pronunciation.
She gave the word its French pronunciation.
sentence.Network_cn: 她读出了该词的法语发音。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin pronuntiatio(n-), from the verb pronuntiare (see pronounce)

entry.def: The pronunciation of a word or language is the way in which it is pronounced.

example.ex: She gave the word its French pronunciation...
example.tran: 她读出了该词的法语发音。

example.ex: You're going to have to forgive my pronunciation.

means.word_mean: 1. the manner in which someone utters a word;
2. the way a word or a language is customarily spoken;

sentences.sentence: "the pronunciation of Chinese is difficult for foreigners"

auth_sentence.content: Good pronunciation is very important for good spoken communication.
auth_sentence.res_content: Good pronunciation is very important for good spoken communication.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Good pronunciation is very important for good spoken communication.

auth_sentence.content: Sometimes her received pronunciation can distance the whole experience.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sometimes her received pronunciation can distance the whole experience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sometimes her received pronunciation can distance the whole experience.

auth_sentence.content: I m improving my english pronunciation,as a result.
auth_sentence.res_content: I m improving my english pronunciation,as a result.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I m improving my english pronunciation,as a result.

stems_affixes.word_buile: announce[v.通告]+ment表名词→n.布告,通告;声明,预告
an一再+nounce通知→一再通知→通告

stems_affixes.value_cn: 公开指责,公然抨击;谴责
stems_affixes.word_buile: de坏+nounce讲话,说出→讲坏话→抨击

stems_affixes.value_cn: 公开指责,公然抨击,谴责
stems_affixes.word_buile: denounce[v.公开指责,公然抨击;谴责]+ate表动词→v.公开指责,公然抨击,谴责
pro在前+nounce讲话,说出→在[嘴]前讲话→发音
re反+nounce讲话,说出→反过来说→否认

sentences.en: Chinese differs from English in pronun-ciation.
sentences.cn: 汉语和英语在发音上有差别。

sentences.en: The wrong pronunciation of the word is sanctioned by public usage.
sentences.cn: 人们接受了这个字的错误读法, 因为大家都这样念。

means.word_mean: (一个人的)发音, 发音方式

jushi.chinese: 他的发音是非常清楚的。

jushi.english: You can improve your pronunciation in more than one way, such as listening to recordings.
jushi.chinese: 你可以通过不止一种办法,例如听录音机,来改进你的发音。

jushi.english: She had difficulty learning English pronunciation.
jushi.chinese: 她学习英语发音有困难。
